terms.title: Terms of Use and Legal Notice

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to MadAssistant. This application has been developed to provide quick access to emergency services in Madagascar. By using this application, you agree to these terms of use.

usage.title: 2. Application Usage
usage.content: MadAssistant is intended exclusively to facilitate access to emergency services. The application provides phone numbers and contact information for health, security, and fire services. Users are responsible for the appropriate use of this information.

liability.title: 3. Liability
liability.content: The developers of MadAssistant cannot be held responsible for the accuracy of contact information or the availability of emergency services. In case of real emergency, immediately contact the competent authorities.

privacy.title: 4. Personal Data
privacy.content: MadAssistant does not collect any personal data. The application works locally on your device and does not transmit any information to external servers, except during emergency calls.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this application or these terms of use, please contact the development team at ISPM (Institut Sup√©rieur Polytechnique de Madagascar).
